entry.title: As Taliban took over, she sent a message to her old teacher. See what happened next

media:group.media:title: As Taliban took over, she sent a message to her old teacher. See what happened next
media:group.media:description: As the Taliban closed in on Kabul, Italian educator Selene Biffi reached out to her former Afghan students. Three of her students and their families made it out of Afghanistan and after quarantine they were finally reunited with their teacher. CNN's Ben Wedeman reports. #CNN #News

entry.title: Police and FBI question the parents of Gabby Petito’s fiancé

media:group.media:title: Police and FBI question the parents of Gabby Petito’s fiancé
media:group.media:description: The FBI entered and searched the family home of Gabby Petito's fiancé Brian Laundrie in Florida, a day after investigators across the country found what they believe to be her remains. CNN’s Leyla Santiago has more. #CNN #News

entry.title: Figure who inspired ‘Hotel Rwanda’ found guilty on terrorism-related charges

media:group.media:title: Figure who inspired ‘Hotel Rwanda’ found guilty on terrorism-related charges
media:group.media:description: Paul Rusesabagina, who inspired the film 'Hotel Rwanda,' has been found guilty by a court in Kigali of being part of a terror group, MRCD-FLN. Rusesabagina, along with 20 other people, was accused of conspiring to launch attacks on Rwandan territory in 2018 and 2019, resulting in at least nine deaths. CNN’s Eleni Giokos reports. #CNN #News

entry.title: Video shows Trudeau facing angry voters in Canadian election

media:group.media:title: Video shows Trudeau facing angry voters in Canadian election
media:group.media:description: Canadians are heading to the polls in a snap election that could bolster Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's position -- or imbue the country's government with bitter political polarization. CNN's Paula Newton reports. #CNN #News

entry.title: Senate parliamentarian deals blow to Biden’s plan

media:group.media:title: Senate parliamentarian deals blow to Biden’s plan
media:group.media:description: President Joe Biden suffered a setback to his domestic agenda after the Senate parliamentarian issued guidance that Senate Democrats can’t include a pathway to legal citizenship for millions of immigrants as part of the $3.5 trillion spending plan. #CNN #News

entry.title: Daughter says media misinformation contributed to dad's Covid-19 death

media:group.media:title: Daughter says media misinformation contributed to dad's Covid-19 death
media:group.media:description: A family is grieving the loss of their vaccine-hesitant father after he passed away from Covid-19. #CNN #News

entry.title: San Francisco mayor spotted defying her own mask guidelines

media:group.media:title: San Francisco mayor spotted defying her own mask guidelines
media:group.media:description: CNN's Brianna Keilar rolls the tape on San Francisco Mayor London Breed after she was spotted violating her own mask guidelines at a concert. #CNN #News

entry.title: WSJ: Trump wants McConnell voted out of Senate

media:group.media:title: WSJ: Trump wants McConnell voted out of Senate
media:group.media:description: The Wall Street Journal is reporting that former President Trump wants Sen. Mitch McConnell out as Senate minority leader and is searching for Republicans willing to mount a challenge. #CNN #News

entry.title: Putin's party on track to retain majority amid fraud claims

media:group.media:title: Putin's party on track to retain majority amid fraud claims
media:group.media:description: Russia's ruling party United Russia is on track to secure a majority following a three-day parliamentary election, according to early results and an exit poll reported by Russian state media RIA Novosti. Opposition members and independent observers have accused Russian officials of blatant election fraud with some incidents being caught on cameras. CNN's Matthew Chance reports from Moscow. #CNN #News

entry.title: Covid vaccine is safe for kids aged 5-11, Pfizer says

media:group.media:title: Covid vaccine is safe for kids aged 5-11, Pfizer says
media:group.media:description: In a highly anticipated announcement, Pfizer said a Phase 2/3 trial showed its Covid-19 vaccine was safe and generated a "robust" antibody response in children ages 5 to 11. CNN’s Dr. Sanjay Gupta and Adm. Brett Giroir, former assistant for secretary for health under former President Trump, weigh in on the news. #CNN #News

entry.title: Gabby Petito’s body likely found, says FBI

media:group.media:title: Gabby Petito’s body likely found, says FBI
media:group.media:description: The case of missing Gabby Petito took a tragic turn when police found human remains during their search for her -- and officials are working to determine whether the discovery could answer questions regarding what happened to the 22-year-old. CNN’s Leyla Santiago reports. #CNN #News

entry.title: Reporter shows DC rallygoer video of Jan. 6 attack. See his reaction

media:group.media:title: Reporter shows DC rallygoer video of Jan. 6 attack. See his reaction
media:group.media:description: CNN reporter Shimon Prokupecz spoke to a rallygoer at the right-wing Justice for January 6 rally in support of the Capitol rioters about the January 6 attack. #ShimonProkupecz #CNN #Newsroom

entry.title: First-ever civilian SpaceX flight returns from orbit

media:group.media:title: First-ever civilian SpaceX flight returns from orbit
media:group.media:description: Four people returned to Earth from a three-day extraterrestrial excursion aboard a SpaceX Crew Dragon capsule, marking the end of the first-ever flight to Earth's orbit flown entirely by tourists or otherwise non-astronauts. #CNN #News

entry.title: Acosta calls out Fox News for promoting vaccine lies while 90% of company is vaccinated

media:group.media:title: Acosta calls out Fox News for promoting vaccine lies while 90% of company is vaccinated
media:group.media:description: CNN's Jim Acosta calls out Fox News' continued push of coronanvirus vaccine misinformation. #CNN #News

entry.title: The Murdaugh family saga a tangled web of secrets and murder

media:group.media:title: The Murdaugh family saga a tangled web of secrets and murder
media:group.media:description: A powerful family. A deadly boating accident. Two mysterious slayings. Drug addiction, stolen money and a botched shooting in an alleged insurance fraud scheme. It sounds like someone took a list of sordid elements and stuffed them all into a crime thriller so twisty it could only be fiction. But the tortuous tale of the Murdaughs, a prominent South Carolina family with shadowy secrets, is real. And it's far from over. The story took a fresh turn this week when investigators arrested patriarch Alex Murdaugh for allegedly hiring a hit man to kill him in a failed attempt to collect millions in life insurance for his surviving son, Buster. This came three months after Murdaugh's wife and other son were gunned down on the family's secluded estate. These events led authorities to open investigations into several other mysterious deaths -- dating back years -- with apparent ties to the Murdaughs. Now the family's legacy of influence is crumbling and the rural area around Hampton, some 75 miles west of Charleston, is buzzing with theories. The evolving saga has inspired at least one podcast and gripped amateur sleuths around the state -- and the nation. #MartinSavidge #CNN #Newsroom
